programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1030
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep122
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Way to Health (M) Ep263264
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep486
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home (M) Ep2425
programme.desc: Every one of them showed up in this house with some sort of lacking until they've met Mommy Hsiao-Li. Although they are not biologicap related, they Stay with each other like a real family.

programme.title: Marrying Mr Perfect
programme.desc: Winnie is dumped by her boyfriend in her late twenties and unknowingly meets Koo, a ruthless tycoon in business and a playboy. Koo temporarily switches identities with his driver for security reason and falls for Winnie as she is the first girl to love him for who he is. What will happen when Winnie know Koos real identity?

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fianc left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Master Luo, a washed-up stuntman, trains his beloved horse Red Hare to be a stunt horse. Due to his debts though, Red Hare may be taken away by the debtors. Master Luo has no choice but to seek help from his estranged daughter, and the incident ends up becoming a golden opportunity for them to reconcile.

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: Fight Back to School III
programme.desc: The millionaire, Million Wong , is found dead in a hotel room. Officer Sing Sing (Stephen Chow) is called in when a man is murdered with an ice pick during sexual intercourse. By an uncanny coincidence the man looks identical to Sing so the decision is made to send him in as an undercover again for further investigation. In the same day, he finds himself with a beautiful wife (Anita Mui), an incompetent sidekick (Anthony Wong) and one very unhappy girlfriend (Cheung Man). All this and somehow he still has to try and solve the case!

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: This is a story of ICAC investigators fighting against rampant corruption in early 1970s Hong Kong. A police sergeant teams up with a triad boss to make billions of dollars in bribes. As a lawyer joins his friend in ICAC to investigate their collusion and fight against corruption, the battle between the righteous and the wicked has just begun.

programme.title: She's a Man. He's a Woman.
programme.desc: This is a romantic comedy about a quarrelsome and loving couple whose spirits are being swapped over after a thunderstorm. The sexy lady finds herself carrying an ugly mans spirit, and vice versa. Can they switch their spirits back, or do they need to get use to the situation for the rest of their lives?

programme.title: Fallen Angels
programme.desc: The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai looks at five fallen angels who suffer love and loss amidst the crime and chaos of Hong Kongs neon nights in this movie. Karen Mok won Best Supporting Actress in the 15th Hong Kong Film Awards for her remarkable role as a broken-hearted party girl.

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kongs Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: Tales from the Occult
programme.desc: The movie consists of three tales about the horrors lurking in dark corners of the city. A young pop star goes back into depression when spooky things happen in her new home; an online influencer performs live in a mall, but it ends up being a livestream of his death; the residents of a tenement building battle a mysterious figure in the stairwell.

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: In a chilly winter, De and his family goes on a self-drive tour to Changbai Mountain. The holiday turns tragic when Des eight-year-old son goes missing. He seeks help from the local police but is unable to find his son. Though the golden hour has passed, De and the rescue team insist on continuing the search. Can they finally rescue the boy?

programme.title: Golden Job
programme.desc: A group of former mercenaries reunite to plan an epic heist: ambushing a truckload of medicine held by a foreign intelligence agency and send it to a refugee camp in need. When they find the truck filled with stolen gold however, they realize they have been double-crossed by one of their own and putting the situation right will be an all-out war.

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: Hell Hole
programme.desc: The movie features three horror stories in different era: a pregnant woman haunted by a ghost sacrifices her life to save her baby; a boy commits suicide after being bullied by four medical students and his spirit returns for revenge; some company staff are haunted after they open a box of used clothes, releasing a more than 20-year resentment.

programme.title: Mission Milano
programme.desc: A wealthy entrepreneur goes undercover with an Interpol agent to protect a new invention, the Seed of God, from falling into an international crime conglomerate.

programme.title: Song of Spring
programme.desc: An 85-year-old mother lives with her 65-year-old daughter who is suffering from Alzheimer's disease, causing her to suffer a decline in memory, mental confusion and disorientation. Though the elderly mother has to shoulder the burden of a caregiver, she still wants to be with her daughter forever.

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Polices Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Player
programme.desc: Chinese Feng Shui master, Carson (Chapman To) was a "Natural Born Player", taking names and breaking hearts. Fate had it that he would meet his match, the hot veterinarian, Chi-Ling (Chrissie Chau). It was love at first sight but neither could stand the other's fickle nature lest the affair might have ended as soon as it began.

programme.title: The Italian Recipe
programme.desc: Famous pop idol Peng travels to Rome for a reality show and encounters an ordinary girl, Mang, who dreams of becoming a great chef after migrating to Italy. Peng and Mang have nothing in common but spend a magical night in Rome together. Their lives begin to change as the two start to fall in love.

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Lius family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: Beyond the Dream
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who falls in love with a young girl he first met. As he struggles to reveal his illness, Lok has a relapse and becomes delusional. Little does he know she is a mental health counsellor who has a hidden agenda. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Yan is a police mole in the triad and joined them before he graduated from the police academy, while Ming is a triad mole in the police since young. Leading parallel lives, both men feel increasingly trapped in their false surroundings, and a series of cat-and-mouse chases ensue as both the triad and the police compete to uncover the others mole.

programme.title: One and Only
programme.desc: Veteran street dancer Ding Lei, invites passionate street dancer, Chen Shuo to his dance club. Sparks fly when Chen dances with the clubs top dancers. Chen pursues his dream to perform but discovers that Ding has invited him for another reason. As both of them deal with hard times, can they turn the tide on the challenges that they are facing?

programme.title: Princess and 7 Kung Fu Masters
programme.desc: Seven Kung Fu masters live in Lucky Town, the only safe residing place in northeast China. When warlord Lam refuses to side with the Japanese, an agent is assigned to take over his army and kill his daughter using ninjutsu. Lams daughter escapes and seeks help from the seven masters, who finally defeat the enemy and save the warlord!

programme.title: iGirl
programme.desc: Evan, Johnny, and Irwin are best friends. All three of them get dumped by their girlfriends one day and decide to find three robotic substitutes, the iGirls, as their new girlfriends. However, as time goes by, Evan finds himself falling in love with his iGirl

programme.title: Wu Kong
programme.desc: Set 500 years before the Monkey King Wu Kong wreaks havoc in the heavenly kingdom, the movie tells the story of how Wu Kong who, unwilling to bow to his own destiny, sets out to rebel against the gods.

programme.title: Love is Blind, Hate Too
programme.desc: Bo lost her eye sight in a serious car accident a year ago. One day, she is left alone at home when her husband is away on a work trip. An intruder enters Bo's house and takes her hostage. As Bo tries to survive his mental and psychological torture, she discovers her husband's secret which is related to the accident leading to her blindness

programme.title: Death Notice
programme.desc: A serial killer leaves death notices in a city, stating when, how and who he will murder. Even if the victims report it to the police and receive protection, the killer can still break through and execute them. While the police sets up a special task force in response, they expose an even bigger conspiracy behind.

programme.title: As Tears Go By
programme.desc: Mobsters Wah and Fly are buddies. Wah loves his cousin, but cannot make their relationship work as he is a mobster. Fly infuriates a mob boss one day and got beaten up badly, implicating Wah too. He then takes up a fatal task to make amends

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back

programme.title: Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A Wu Dang disciple Fu, kills the chief of Wu Dang Clan and frames it on the chiefs illegitimate child, Yun. Fu then proclaims himself the new chief and orders the killing of Yun, who vows to avenge his fathers death and learns the invincible silkworm martial arts style in order to defeat Fu.

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: The Knight Of Knights
programme.desc: Wen Su Chen, the leader of seven knights, sends his six sworn brothers to investigate a monastery. Unfortunately, they are killed by an abbot who plans to murder Inspector Lin. Wen saved Lin and battles the abbot to avenge his dead sworn brothers. With Lin and his armys help, they bring down the ruthless monks in the monastery.

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: Rape Of The Sword
programme.desc: The film starts out with two students fighting for their deceased master's sword called the "Green Frost Sword". Han kills the other student, takes the sword and offer it to the king. The wife of the other dead student plots to take revenge, going undercover to retrieve the sword at the first opportunity in this tale of revenge and betrayal.

programme.title: Asia-Pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: The 36Th Chamber Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Gordon Liu plays an anti-Manchu rebel who escapes to the Shaolin Temple and learns what it truly takes to become a martial arts master by challenging the 35 Shaolin Kung Fu chambers, eventually creating the 36th chamber himself.

programme.title: Hex
programme.desc: This supernatural mystery tells the story of a sickly wife and her maid conspiring to kill her beastly husband, leading to a string of events with spooky twists and turns.

programme.title: A Taste Of Cold Steel
programme.desc: It's a no-holds-barred battle to the death for possession of the invaluable Purple Sword. Assistant director Wang Po-yi also wrote this entertaining and exciting adventure which could have also been called "The Five Tigers" since there's no doubt that this quintet is the highlight of the action. Huang Tsung-shun is "Fierce Tiger," Hung Liu is "Drunk Tiger," Hsu Erh-niu is "Lame Tiger," award-winning actor Ku Feng is "One-eyed Tiger" and respected director/actor Wu Ma is "Sick Tiger" in a tangle of tussles and thrills.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Changs. On the Changs farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: One Way Only
programme.desc: Danny is a motorbike workshop owner, once was a renowned motorcycle racer, but were seriously injured in an illegal race. Mai, student of Danny, wins a race in Macau under Danny's help. However, because of money and honour, Mai joins illegal races. After knowing this, Li persuades Mai to stop illegal races, but Mai seems cannot find his way out

programme.title: Mission Impossible
programme.desc: A sword masters daughter is pursued and poisoned by an evil master when bringing back the stolen Golden Sword to the palace. She dies on the run and returns as a spirit to take revenge by killing the evil master, and soon vanishes after returning the sword to the emperor.

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: Ten Tigers Of Kwang Tung
programme.desc: The Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung is a group of anti-Ching martial artists who have killed a Ching official. Years later, when five disciples and descendants of Ten Tigers meet one night, one of them is killed by the son of the late Ching official who returns with a vengeance. They must fight against him to protect the Ten Tigers clan

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.title: Kid From Kwangtung
programme.desc: After many years as a respected actor and action choreographer, the Shaw Studio finally gave the dependable and commendable Hsu Hsia a chance to direct his own movies. He didn't waste the opportunity, inviting three other kung-fu designers to help on this fight-filled thriller. Wang Yu, co-star of such classics as Dirty Ho and The Kid With A Tattoo, here takes center stage as a young rascal caught between an anti-Ching Confederation and violent, vengeful Ching troops. But when he discovers that the good guys are led by master martial arts actor Jen Shih-kuan and the bad guys are led by the incredible Huang Cheng-li everyone knows that loads of great kung-fu is in store.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: The Chinese Boxer
programme.desc: A Japanese karate master and Diao Er, who has been expelled from his martial arts school, return to the school to kill the school master and his disciples. After the massacre, disciple Lei Ming embarks on a vigorous training regime and vows to avenge their deaths. A fatal battle is about to begin

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bills nieces!

programme.title: Have Sword Will Travel
programme.desc: When the head of a manor loses his kung fu skills, he enlists his nephew and his fianc to help escort gold to the capital. The duo run into a mysterious knight along the way and they join hands to prevent bandits from stealing the gold.

programme.title: The Kingdom And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the Emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. When he sends for Li one year later, she was too ill to withstand the arduous journey and arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: The Twelve Gold Medallions
programme.desc: This was one of top three films of 1970 and winner of "Outstanding Drama" at the 9th Golden Horse Awards. The evil minister uses twelve golden medallions to summon war hero Yueh Fei back from the frontline and execute him. A group of wandering warriors, led by Yueh Hua and Chin Ping, try to stop the medallion couriers.

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Wu Song is appointed as chief constable after killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang, seduces Wu Song but gets rejected by him, and engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang when he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brothers death, Wu Song kills both of them.

programme.title: The Convict Killer
programme.desc: After spending fifteen years in prison on trumped-up charges for drug smuggling, the martial arts master Teng Piao embarks on a journey to take revenge on the person who sets him up - Black Leopard. Unfortunately for Piao, no one knows the real identity of Black Leopard, except that there is a black leopard tattoo on his chest.

programme.title: The Deadly Knives
programme.desc: Martial arts student Yen returns from school to defend his family homestead against Japanese financiers after his father is killed. On the way, he meets Hua and falls in love with her. However, Hua discovers that her father is plotting with the Japanese to take Yens property and wants to murder him. It is a tough choice between family and love

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Three hundred thousand worth of silver is robbed by a thief using a whip as the weapon. As it is a signature weapon used by a martial arts master Shadow Whip, he is suspected and hunted. No one sees him after that. Fifteen years later, a young girl Yang shows up using the same weapon. Who is this girl and what has happened to Shadow Whip?

programme.title: Vengeance Of A Snow Girl
programme.desc: A crippled woman seeks vengeance against the four men who killed her parents. However, when she crosses path with a young warrior who falls in love with her, trouble ensues as his father is one of the killers responsible for her family's massacre years ago.

programme.title: Sex, Love And Hate
programme.desc: This masterpiece spins three interconnected tales about Hong Kong society's differing views on love and what women want from love. Follow a trio of Hong Kong women as they explore relationships and fulfil their hopes of finding true love.

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: Let'S Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They get into a misunderstanding at the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to use her to act as his fianc, in order to drive away two women whom he does not like

programme.title: Tales Of A Eunuch
programme.desc: Tales Of A Eunuch reunites the potent mix of martial arts superstar Gordon Liu, who plays Emperor in cognito Kang Hsi, with the kung-fu comedienne Wang Yu, an anti-Ching revolutionary. It is a film laced with wild barrages of excellent martial arts chiefly choreographed by Yuen Hua and Yuan Pien; Jackie Chan's long-time kung-fu classmates. At one time, Wang was considered to be the next Alexander Fu Sheng.

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: When the husband of a doctor, Tung is fatally wounded in an accident, he reveals to her about his affair with Blackie, who is impregnated with his baby. Despite the devastation of the betrayal and the eventual death of her husband, Tung is pressured by her mother-in-law into putting up with Blackie and offer $1M for her baby...

programme.title: The Sword Stained With Royal Blood
programme.desc: Adapted from Jin Yongs novel, the movie depicts the havoc breaking out in the martial arts world when a warrior on the run uncovers a sword, a training manual, a treasure map and a secret message on the body of a deceased martial arts master.

programme.title: The House Of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: The Kung-Fu Instructor
programme.desc: Wong Yang is a famous martial artist who is forced to teach kung fu to the Mong Clan, an evil clan which is trying to destroy its nemesis, the Chow Clan. Chow Ping from the Chow Clan is a student of Wongs caught in the Mongs territory and as punishment, the Mong Clan wants to cut off Chow Pings limbs. Wong steps in to defend his student.

programme.title: Lego Jurassic Park: The Unofficial Retelling
programme.desc: The ever charming and now slightly older Chaos Mathematician Dr. Ian Malcolm retells the tale of what happened that dreadful night at Jurassic Park.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: Determined to gain control of her life, Ella sets off on a journey to find her fairy godmother to lift her curse of obedience.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep21
programme.desc: Which Watch - After a battle with Kevin gets mysteriously cut short, Ben turns his attention to one-upping Gwen at Space Camp, but when his arch-nemesis, Kevin, returns with his sights strangely set on his cousin, our hero must uncover who is really behind it all: Charmcaster!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep22
programme.desc: Baby Buktiu - When attacked in the jungle, Team Tennyson is saved by a toddler who looks eerily similar to Tim Buktu, but when they discover it really is a pint-sized version of the nefarious globetrotter, Ben knows there's another threat looming: Nanny Nightmare!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep23
programme.desc: Them's Fightin' Words! - After enjoying some local corn, Team Tennyson discovers a Hartfield-McJoy reenactment in the cornfield next door, but when Hex resurrects the ghosts of the real feuding families, Ben must find a way to bring them together if he is to save the day!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep24
programme.desc: Lickety Split - When a mysterious electrical storm downs the Omni-Copter at the Equator, Team Tennyson soon discovers Solar & Polar are behind it, but when Ben accidentally combines the two into a more powerful Uni-Twin, our hero must think fast if he is going to save the planet!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep25
programme.desc: Mutiny For The Bounty - Team Tennyson discovers that a small village's goats are being terrorized by the legendary Chupacabra, but when Ben realizes it's actually Dr. Animo, our hero must thwart the dastardly doctor before he uses the essence of the goats to power up into an unstoppable form!

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Now You Sia, Now You Don't! - When Daphne gets a call from her good friend singer-songwriter Sia the gang finds themselves in a mystery involving an evil demon ghost.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep14
programme.desc: The Nightmare Ghost Of Psychic U! - The gang gets lost in the Pocono Mountains of Pennsylvania.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Quit Clowning! - Shaggy and Scooby take the gang to meet their good friend actor and comedian Kenan Thompson.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Family Matters - Dorothy and friends help Woozy find his family, but when their attempts go awry, Woozy bursts into tears, creating a raging river that's sweeping through Oz! Now they realise they're a family!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep25
programme.desc: The Emerald Of Zog - Dorothy and friends are looking for a replacement emerald for Ozma's magic wand when they are captured by ZOG, a sea monster, and taken to his under water kingdom.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Cooking Up Some Magic - It's Cookie Eating Day and Dorothy must whip up enough cookies for all of Oz. Dorothy uses a magical baking pan. But in addition to multiplying the cookies, it also brings them to life.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep27
programme.desc: Copy Cat - Wilhelmina steals Ozma's copy cat and makes clones of herself to storm the Emerald Castle demanding the ruby slippers. For Dorothy to combat all the Wilhelminas, she makes a fake pair of ruby slippers and lures them to the Truth Fountain.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Snow Place Like Home - When Queen Ozma shakes her magic snow globe, a snow cloud descends on Oz and for the first time it snows. The Ozians love the snow until it gets colder and shows no sign of letting up. Dorothy and friends must find a way to end the winter.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep29
programme.desc: Mirroer Madness - Wilhelmina steals Queen Ozma's magic mirror and becomes so infatuated with her own reflection she gives up on her other hobbies. The more she looks in the mirror, the bigger her reflection grows

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S1 Ep4
programme.desc: I Wish She Would Trust Me - A wish about trust causes a serious trust issue between Daniel and Ruby, too. Meanwhile, Daniel learns secrets about his dad that he never knew.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep30
programme.desc: Everything's Coming Up Poppies - It's the Poppin' Poppies Parade and Dorothy needs poppies to cover her float. But the poppy field has been picked dry, save for one poppy. Dorothy uses a plant grow potion on the poppy but this is the last of the Wicked Witch's sleeping poppies!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep31
programme.desc: A Cut Above The Rest - Ozma is helping Dorothy get ready for the Oz Royal Ball. Dorothy's worried about remembering all the protocols for meeting the royals but Patchwork Girl can make a magic dress that will take care of the protocol for her.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep32
programme.desc: Abraca-Oops - When Ozma is practicing magic and can't remember the magic word, Dorothy yells Abracadabra. In Oz, that magic word actually takes magic away. It lasts one day. Too bad today is the magic contest where wizards and witches come for a competition.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep33
programme.desc: Halloween Heist - Dorothy teaches her friends about Halloween and Wilhelmina thinks this sounds like the perfect holiday. Wilhelmina is going to hijack Halloween! She creates Jack Pumpkinhead to help her play a trick on Dorothy.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep34
programme.desc: Haunt Me Not - It's Halloween night and Dorothy and crew are trick or treating when they come to the end of the Yellow Brick Road. Dorothy convinces them to follow the Red Brick Road instead. Their journey leads to a haunted house.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep35
programme.desc: Wheelers Of Fortune - Bricks are disappearing from the Yellow Brick Road. When Dorothy and her friends follow the wheel prints back to the Wheelers hideout, they find Rustle has been stealing the bricks to cover up the fact his back wheel is broken.

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S1 Ep5
programme.desc: I Wish I Got The Credit I Deserve - While Daniel struggles to understand his daughters new vocation, Ruby embarks on a scientific wish that helps bring father and daughter to a meeting of the minds.

programme.desc: George Clooney and Julia Roberts play divorces on a crazy trip to Bali to prevent their lovesick daughter from making the same mistake they did.

programme.title: Ben 10 Vs.The Universe: The Movie
programme.desc: When a blast from Ben's past - Vilgax - returns to do double the damage on Team Tennyson and planet Earth itself, Ben must go interstellar to save the day .

programme.desc: Dolly finds herself taking a private journey into her past, guided by the mysterious appearances of her personal Three Wise Men.

programme.title: Crossword Mysteries: Terminal Descent
programme.desc: After volunteering to participate in a crossword solving competition with a new supercomputer, crossword puzzle editor Tess Harper finds herself swept up into the investigation of the bizarre murder of the tech CEO.

programme.title: Crashbox S1 Ep16
programme.desc: An outrageously insane new game show of puzzles and brainteasers for kids to play on television.

programme.title: Letters To Juliet
programme.desc: When a young American travels to the city of Verona, she joins a group of volunteers who respond to letters to Juliet seeking advice about love.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Speechless On The Seine - While in Paris, France, Ben catches Zombozo robbing the Louvre, but when Zombozo hypnotizes Ben to remain speechless, Ben must navigate a foreign land like a mime in order to stop the criminal clown and his travelling circus.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Poles Apart - A trip to the South Pole goes upside down when Team Tennyson lands on the North Pole instead, but Ben quickly discovers the culprits: Solar & Polar Twain, magnetically-powered scientists who want to hold the world ransom by threatening to reverse Earth's magnetic poles!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Show Don't Tell - Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max arrive at a Native American national park to witness the Ayasha Plinths - an ancient Stonehenge-like rock formation - but when the sinister sorcerer Hex arrives, Ben must battle against a beast Hex magically made out of huge rocks!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Don't Touch - Team Tennyson checks out a Samurai Museum in Tokyo, where Ben is too impatient to wait out the Calligraphy experience for the more exciting-sounding Samurai one, but when a dangerous Samurai sword is stolen from the exhibit, Ben must take on its thief - the new Big Bad in town, the Forever Knight.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Big In Japan - During a tour of the Japanese Robotics Museum, Ben finds hero-gone-wrong Tim Buktu 'trying to save' Tokyo from a Dragon, but has Tim finally turned over a new leaf, or is this just another one of his half-baked plans to play the part of hero?

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Welcome To Zombozo-Zone! - During medieval times, Team Tennyson must fight to remember that they're not in the past at all, but actually at a Renaissance-esque faire- where 'King Zombozo' has hypnotized its guests into thinking they live in the past!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Bridge Out - After an overpass collapses on the highway, Team Tennyson is in a traffic jam along with Simon Sez and family, but when Ben and Simon team up to tackle the gridlock together, Simon only makes matters much, much worse.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Big Ben 10 - When Ben and family go to London to visit the legendary Big Ben, the Bugg Brothers are there to greet them - with yet another outrageously over-the-top plan of course: to shrink the Big Ben bell in order to steal it!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Cyber Slammers - At Biggie Box Japan, Ben waits in an epic line for the release of the latest Sumo Slammers video game, Cyber Slammers, but Ben must soon save the store- not from game-hungry customers, but from Steam Smythe, who wants to retro-fit a massive mech with steam punk powers!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep15
programme.desc: Beach Heads - After traveling to Tampa Beach, Florida, Team Tennyson hope to get some much-needed rest & relaxation, but the tempests without a temper, the Weatherheads, have other plans that Ben must thwart: to build a new beach base!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Lagrange Muraille - While visiting China, Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max take a trek to the Great Wall, but their adventure is nearly ruined by daredevils LaGrange and Vin Ethanol trying to jump the international monument, and Ben must hop into the Rustbuggy to chase away the fast and furious foes.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep17
programme.desc: Charm School's Out - During a family cookout at a forest campsite, Charmcaster users her magic to switch places with Gwen, but when Ben catches 'Charmcaster' sneaking about, he attacks- unaware it's actually his cursed cousin!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Billy Bajillions - In Aspen, Colorado, Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max are on a hike to find the Forgeti, but when they realize they've stumbled upon Billy Billions own 'Winter in July' ski resort, Ben must battle Billy-with an assist from the Forgeti itself.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep19
programme.desc: Franken-Fight - Ben hops into the Rustbuggy for a driving lesson along the sand dunes of Cape Cod, but he takes a freaky switchback turn when the Rustbuggy is mutated into a motor-monster by Bootleg - another alien transformation of Kevin 11, with powers similar to Upgrade!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Buggin' The Buggs - Team Tennyson travel to the Chrysalen Institute for some hot yoga and good vibes, only to find that the Bugg Brothers are on vacation, too- but are the sneaky insectoids really on holiday, or just cooking up yet another silly, yet high stakes scheme?

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep21
programme.desc: Which Watch - After a battle with Kevin gets mysteriously cut short, Ben turns his attention to one-upping Gwen at Space Camp, but when his arch-nemesis, Kevin, returns with his sights strangely set on his cousin, our hero must uncover who is really behind it all: Charmcaster!

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars as Captain Chesley 'Sully' Sullenberger, who landed his disabled plane on the Hudson River, saving the lives of all on board.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: Tom Cruise reprises his role as Agent Ethan Hunt, who returns to fight thieves and terrorists when a virus threatens to destroy the world.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible Ghost Protocol
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt and his team get called to exonerate the IMFs name when it gets implicated in the Kremlin bombing.

programme.title: Icebox
programme.desc: A 12-year-old Honduran boy, is forced to flee his home and seek asylum in the United States, only to find himself trapped in the U.S. immigration system.

programme.title: In Pursuit Of Honor
programme.desc: Don Johnson leads a group of men in the fight to save the cavalry's last horses from slaughter.

programme.title: Fall
programme.desc: For best friends Becky and Hunter, life is all about conquering fears and pushing limits. But after they climb 2,000 feet to the top of a remote, abandoned radio tower, they find themselves stranded with no way down.

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber Of Fleet Street
programme.desc: Benjamin Barker, a man unjustly sent to prison by a lecherous judge, vows revenge for the consequences of what happened to his wife and daughter.

programme.title: Elephant
programme.desc: A hard-hitting HBO Original docu-drama by director Gus Van Sant that delves into the reality of high-school life.

programme.title: The Offering
programme.desc: In hopes of reconciling with his orthodox father, the son of a Chasidic funeral director returns home with his pregnant wife in tow.

programme.title: Mortal Kombat Legends: Snow Blind
programme.desc: The vicious, power-mad Kano is determined to take over Earthrealm, one soul at a time. Assisted by a trio of cold Black Dragon mercenaries, he embarks on a brutal assault from town to defenseless town.

programme.title: The Pacific S1 Ep7

programme.title: This Is Where I Leave You
programme.desc: When their father passes away, four grown siblings (Jason Bateman, Tina Fey, Adam Driver, Corey Stoll), bruised and banged up by their respective adult lives, are forced to return to their childhood home and live under the same roof together for a week, along with their over-sharing mother (Jane Fonda) and an assortment of spouses, exes and might-have-beens. Confronting their history and the frayed states of their relationships among the people who know and love them best, they ultimately reconnect in hysterical and emotionally affecting ways amid the chaos, humor, heartache and redemption that only families can provide-- driving us insane even as they remind us of our truest, and often best, selves. Comedy director Shawn Levy (Date Night)helms the hilarious script by Jonathan Tropper based on his own best-selling novel.

programme.desc: Discover why peanuts enjoy a good tumble and hot oil roast; how an industrial juicer pours out massive amounts of creamy mango smoothies; the secret chemistry behind full fat bocconcini cheese; and how vegan brownies can be healthy and sinfully delicious.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - Untamed West Ep2
programme.desc: New Zealands West Coast is like nowhere else on Earth. From glacier-covered mountains to rain-drenched native forests to rough frigid seas, the landscape defies belief. Isolated from the rest of the world, this strip of almost untouched wilderness hides a host of endemic animals. Evolutionary castaways, every one of them is a rare ecological jewel. From alpine parrots and shy penguins to mammal-like kiwis and ancient eels. To survive the conditions the wildlife here has to be hardy, cunning and resourceful. A journey along the West Coast reveals the beauty of this land, and the trials and tribulations of the wildlife that live here.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Spud, Digger, and Tommy Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the Tasmanian Devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - Finding a Family Ep4
programme.desc: Mona, a female cotton top tamarin is all alone in her tropical forest home. She has left the security of her birth family to search for an unrelated troop which might provide her with a future mate.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Rescuers Ep1
programme.desc: Dogs around the world come to the rescue in surprising ways. Some search for survivors when disaster strikes or rescue animals from poachers and wildlife traffickers. Others help us in times of troubleboth on land and in the water.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Lifesavers Ep2
programme.desc: Meet a border collie that protects aircraft from lethal bird strikes, a sprocker spaniel whose sense of smell is saving imperilled water voles, and an Anatolian shepherd that helps conserve Africas most endangered big cat, the cheetah.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Primate Families Ep6
programme.desc: The sprawling primate family includes animals as different as monkeys, lemurs and humans. Follow primate babies to see how they bond with their mothers, learn to socialize, and adapt to an ever-changing environment.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 - Vietnam: the Journey's End Ep10
programme.desc: The Mekong Delta is one of the largest on Earth. Formed over the last 8000 years, it fans out and discharges into the South China Sea via nine channels. These channels split and shape the coastline, creating unique habitats for a variety of animals.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Wild Coast Ep2
programme.desc: Go up against Australias wiliest gladiators and their impressive arsenals. Learn if these weapons, such as the kangaroos deadly boxing moves and the redback spiders precision-engineered traps, can help them survive the ravages of climate change.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - A Tale of Two Penguins Ep1
programme.desc: At the waters edge a brave group of male penguins gather, preparing to make the dangerous journey ashore. With many threats ahead, there is safety in number and these petite penguins have important business to attend. Its time to breed and they must find a burrow before the females arrive.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - White Rhinos of Enasoit Ep3
programme.desc: The conservation team attempts to move two white rhinos to Ol Pejeta from the nearby Enasoit ranch after it is discovered that poachers have been watching the animals.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Enjoy the spring baby boom at the center as the staff go gaga over an adorable bundle of baby possums. Then see the rescue team hit a rooftop patio for a little R and R: retrieving and rescuing a mama and her ducklings perched high above the city.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Fugitive Giants Ep4
programme.desc: With elephant numbers on the rise, so too are the conflicts Ol Pejeta has to deal with, like a gang of crop-raiding Pachyderms. The order is given to detusk three of the problem animals, but first the team will have to remove a collar from a blind elephant.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 - Land of Extremes Ep1
programme.desc: This episode visually illustrates how the Arctic, locked in darkness for nearly seven months, springs to life once the sun rises above the horizon. We explore ideas of migration, hibernation, the food web and habitat change, and are introduced to some of the Arctics most magnificent and iconic creatures and its most dramatic landscapes.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Jungle River Ep3
programme.desc: Cheer as young gladiators earn their stripes in the dense tropical forests of the Americas. Stand back as a poison dart frog launches a toxic barrage, observe a jaguar-caiman turf war, and see a hungry coati cross paths with a defensive tarantula.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 - Sanctuary Ep5
programme.desc: Theres strength in numbers. Especially in the wild. For many species, its the very reason why individuals come together. Protecting the empire is imperative to survival. For these animals, protection means isolation finding sanctuary from the threats outside their boundaries.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - Romeo and Julieta Ep5
programme.desc: This is the story of Julieta, a female golden dart frog, in search of her Romeo. Shes about to lay her eggs and must find a male to fertilize them. Romeos calls guide her through the forest, but crossing the dense rainforest is no easy feat.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 2 Ep2
programme.desc: See staff care for baby bunnies injured in a dog attack and then join the centers release team as they introduce an abandoned cygnet to an adoptive mother swan, and find that things dont go exactly as planned.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Tides of Sweetwater Ep5
programme.desc: A look at the plight of chimpanzees that survive the bush meat trade to become captive animals. At the same time, we look at the reintroduction of colobus monkeys into the Ewaso river area of Ol Pejeta.

programme.title: Deadly Australians 1 - Forests Ep1
programme.desc: Australia is home to the world's most toxic, venomous and dangerous creatures. From the oceans to the forest, swamps and deserts, it's a continent teeming with a hugely disproportionate number of creatures that can bite, poison or maim.

programme.title: Deadly Australians 1 - Wetlands Ep2
programme.desc: As water flows from Australia's highlands into the seas, an assortment of environmental niches set the stage for multifaceted interactions between predators and their prey.

programme.title: Deadly Australians 1 - Deserts Ep3
programme.desc: Behind the facade of Australias dramatic scenery is a motley crew of silent assassins, con artists, gang members and brutal brawlers, vying for supremacy amidst the harsh, dry and desolate Australian desert. Competition for resources is so fierce, its animal residents have developed some ingenious methods of survival.

programme.title: Deadly Australians 1 - Oceans Ep4
programme.desc: Australia is home to the worlds most toxic, venomous and dangerous creatures. From the oceans to the forest, swamps and deserts, its a continent teeming with a hugely disproportionate number of creatures that can envenomate, poison or maim.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Sammi, Rose, and Casey Ep1
programme.desc: Roam across America with a road-tripping chicken and meet a mouse family living in an English garden. Beat arachnophobia with a spiders help, trek with the guardian of Earths last two northern white rhinos, and celebrate more interspecies pals.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Bandit, Max, and George Ep2
programme.desc: Learn how cockatoos and platypuses inspired new careers, then explore the shared trauma that bonded a human and an elephant for life. Get playful with 35-year-old George the turkey vulture and say a moving farewell to human-raised kangaroos.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Spud, Digger, and Tommy Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the Tasmanian Devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Toto, Banksi, and Lucy Ep4
programme.desc: Flap around with Banksi the fruit bat and his human surrogate mom, eye a mischievous emu, and celebrate a pigs rescue-versary. Tour manatee heaven and learn to speak baboon with Dingani, who has a one-of-a-kind kinship with his primate pal Lucy.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Spring Ep1
programme.desc: Its spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Summer Ep2
programme.desc: Summer brings long, warm days for wildlife to thrive. Watch animals learn new skills, compete for mates, and escape predators as they try to make the most of the short season.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 2 Ep2
programme.desc: See staff care for baby bunnies injured in a dog attack and then join the centers release team as they introduce an abandoned cygnet to an adoptive mother swan, and find that things dont go exactly as planned.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins 1 - Lemur Spirit Ep1
programme.desc: This is the story of a day in the life of an Indris Family following a mother, father, and their three offspring around their home in the rainforest of Mantadia National Park in Madagascar.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins 1 - Castaway Island Ep2
programme.desc: This film travels around the island visiting some of its most striking landscapes to explore how Madagascars species have evolved over time. Madagascar is a strangely beautiful and unique world with a staggering array of habitats and special landscapes.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Sammi, Rose, and Casey Ep1
programme.desc: Roam across America with a road-tripping chicken and meet a mouse family living in an English garden. Beat arachnophobia with a spiders help, trek with the guardian of Earths last two northern white rhinos, and celebrate more interspecies pals.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Lyca the Painted Wolf Ep1
programme.desc: In central Namibia, a pack of painted wolves roams the arid land. Amid threats from lions and drought, a plucky little pup called Lyca has to grow up fast, learn the skills of a hunter, and find her place as member of the pack.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Downsized Dream Home - When two teachers decided to downsize, they didn't anticipate living in a camper on their riverside lot for over a year after their builder backed out.

programme.title: Build It Forward S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Smoky Mountain Spirit - Matt and Taniya stop in Cosby, Tennessee, where a teacher needs help expanding his family's living space after a fire destroyed their home.

programme.title: Inside Out S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Up In Flames - Multiple issues with a renovation cause Carmine and Mike to pull from each other's budget.

programme.title: Perfect Home: Asia S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Okinawa - When Adam takes a job in Okinawa, Japan as a government contractor for the Airforce, it's time for Sarah to venture out of the heartland and into the city of Okinawa.

programme.title: House Hunters International S140 Ep1
programme.desc: Peace Vs. Project In Spain - A couple has dramatically different ideas when it comes to what kind of lifestyle they want to have in Spain's Island of Mallorca.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Rick's idea of bliss is to spend an afternoon scaling and gutting a freshly caught sea bass before using it to make a simple yet delectable dish which ranks amongst his absolute favourites - steamed sea bass with garlic, ginger and spring onions. He travels to the far west of Cornwall to meet a potter whose work captures the rugged beauty of her surroundings, before heading to the far east of the county on the trail of the poet Charles Causley, who spent his entire life in the Cornish border town of Launceston.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Rick's idea of bliss is to spend an afternoon scaling and gutting a freshly caught sea bass before using it to make a simple yet delectable dish which ranks amongst his absolute favourites - steamed sea bass with garlic, ginger and spring onions. He travels to the far west of Cornwall to meet a potter whose work captures the rugged beauty of her surroundings, before heading to the far east of the county on the trail of the poet Charles Causley, who spent his entire life in the Cornish border town of Launceston.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep46
programme.desc: The Case Of The Disappearing Traffic Cones - When the Builders' traffic cones disappear from their building site, there is chaos all over Brickabuild. Noddy decides to investigate right away and find out who's taken them. Did the Naughticorns take them for their obstacle course? Or was it Farmer Tom who used them to keep his animals under control. Noddy carefully follows the clues and at last discovers it was the Pirates who took them to use as markers for Stripes' Pirate Galleon Driving Test. Noddy tells them about the traffic chaos and the contrite pirates return the cones at once. Best of all Pirate Stripes has passed her test! Well done Noddy, case closed!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep46
programme.desc: Why Eagle Rules The Skies - You see there was a time when Eagle didn't rule the skies. She was a humble bird who kept herself to self. But then one day things start going wrong for the birds - some beast steals Hen's eggs, Hummingbird loses her hum and Tickbird goes missing! Eagle quietly saves the day and Lion rewards her with half his Kingdom. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep46
programme.desc: Plugger's New Job - James has broken down so Mama Mia comandeers Plugger to run her about. Mama Mia has a wonderful time with Plugger and James is jealous. He tries to remedy the situation with disastrous consequences.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep20
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Sorting Machine - Pat and Jess are called to Cardiff to collect a new sorting machine when the Pencaster machine breaks down. Whilst they negotiate with Rowena Roberts, the Cardiff sorting office manager, as to how to move the heavy machine onto the SDS plane, Ben is fighting his own battles at the Pencaster office as his merry band of helpers from the village cause more chaos in their attempts to sort the post!After a quick tour of Gilbertson Castle, Pat and Jess manage to get the new sorting machine to Pencaster just in time to deliver a missing birthday present to Meera. Happy Birthday Meera and well done, Postman Pat!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep15
programme.desc: Double Finked - Magnus's nephew, Axel, arrives on the island and tells the Rescue Riders that he wants to join their team. But is he just a trickster like his uncle?

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep15
programme.desc: Lair - D-Structs kidnaps Revvit to show the crew who's boss when they compete over construction, so Ty plans the perfect heist to rescue their friend.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep15
programme.desc: No Can Do / Adopt-A-Toad - Chet is determined to open a giant can of tomato juice lands in town and Turbo worries that Chet is becoming obsessed with the can. // Turbo donates his race winnings an animal charity, but accidentally adopts a toad who moves into the clubhouse and becomes an obnoxious house guest.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep15
programme.desc: Tip's Deep Dish / Garbage Day - When Tip loses her voice, Oh finds a way to use his own voice to talk to her crush Keanu; Oh invents a way to redo yesterday so Tip can redeem a rotten day.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep15
programme.desc: Lucky And The New Governor - The girls plans to attend the Governors Ball are waylaid when they save a pregnant horse.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep16
programme.desc: Lucky And The Risky Rescue - When a Tuckapaw boy is unfairly arrested, Lucky and her friends plan to break him out of jail.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep32
programme.desc: The Flawed Couple/ Go-Sip Girl - To learn about jobs, Grug assigns kids to the first shadowing/Ugga mistakenly creates the first gossip to impress the nitting club

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep33
programme.desc: Munk History / Happy Howl Day - Grug tries to solve the mystery of where Munk's family is /Eep refuses to join in when Ahhh! Valley celebrates their first holiday, Howl Day

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep36
programme.desc: Halloween - Boss Baby uses the cover of Halloween Night to sneak into Bubeezees Headquarters to shut it all down. Tim covers for Boss by distracting Marisol with a night of trick or treating.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep38
programme.desc: Yellow 100 - Finally promoted to CEO, Boss Baby sets his sights on achieving 100% Baby Love, while dealing with the annoying Puppies and Preeks who rented Baby Corp office space while Boss was gone. Tim and Danny become local heroes after saving a baby's life.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep37
programme.desc: Who's a Good Baby? - A brainwashed Boss Baby breaks free from overly sanitized Bubbeezee products. He rallies the Playgroup Babies to run the company out of business by breaking every product in town.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep10
programme.desc: The Knight's Fall Part 1 - Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Thrown in a cell, Po reunites with Rukhmini and Mr. Ping, and he copes with the truth about Blade as they break out. Po fights Klaus and Veruca but is outmatched. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep1
programme.desc: Enter the Dragon Master - After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep11
programme.desc: The Knight's Fall Part 2 - Blade tells Po the truth about Alfie. The group chases after Klaus and Veruca in an epic snowy mountain chase, culminating in Po saving Blades life as the weasels take off with the gauntlet and the whip. Rukhmini reveals that she actually has the real whip in her staff, and she knows where to go to get the next one: India.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep36
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Confounding Concoction of the Crooked Combotato - A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep38
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shocking Showdown of the Staggering Sugamechangere - It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep37
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ludicrous Lunacy of the Loopy Laserlightmare - Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep15
programme.desc: Night Of The Hunters Pt 1 - When Stormfly is captured by a new enemy, Ryker Grimborn, and the Dragon Hunters, Hiccup, Toothless and the team must rescue her before it's too late

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep41
programme.desc: Extreme Sleepover Club / Vega Swift - Smidge, Guy, Cooper, and Biggie throw an impromptu sleepover in the Fun Factory. But when unexpected visitors show up, will they avoid getting in trouble?/ Satin and Chenille are tasked with babysitting Luna Swift, Novas toddler niece. But she proves to be a bit of a handful

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep15
programme.desc: Gimme, Gimme, Gimme: The Game - King Julien becomes so enthralled with the idea of money that he introduces it to the kingdom.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep36
programme.desc: Halloween - Boss Baby uses the cover of Halloween Night to sneak into Bubeezees Headquarters to shut it all down. Tim covers for Boss by distracting Marisol with a night of trick or treating.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep37
programme.desc: Who's a Good Baby? - A brainwashed Boss Baby breaks free from overly sanitized Bubbeezee products. He rallies the Playgroup Babies to run the company out of business by breaking every product in town.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep38
programme.desc: Yellow 100 - Finally promoted to CEO, Boss Baby sets his sights on achieving 100% Baby Love, while dealing with the annoying Puppies and Preeks who rented Baby Corp office space while Boss was gone. Tim and Danny become local heroes after saving a baby's life.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep10
programme.desc: The Knight's Fall Part 1 - Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Thrown in a cell, Po reunites with Rukhmini and Mr. Ping, and he copes with the truth about Blade as they break out. Po fights Klaus and Veruca but is outmatched. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.desc: Turn And Burn - Stoick, Hiccup and Snotlout search for Spitelout when he goes missing, and ultimately find him on a distant island battling a fiery Singetail dragon.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep33
programme.desc: Copy Cat - When Puss accidentally agrees to ride for both Artephius and the orphans in the annual San Lorenzo horse race, his twin Puss Dos enters the race.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep34
programme.desc: Coin Toss - Dulcinea must save the town from thieves when Puss and the townspeople become obsessed with a gambling game and forget to protect San Lorenzo.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep7
programme.desc: Tears Of Balmera - Hunk and Coran search for a new power crystal on a living planet inhabited by an alien race imprisoned by Zarkon.Back at the Castle, Pidge sabotages Sendak's efforts to steal Voltron.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep8
programme.desc: Taking Flight - Team Voltron responds to a distress call and stops to help a stranded band of freedom fighters on the run from Zarkon.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep33
programme.desc: Close Encounters Of The Mort Kind - When Mort is abducted by "aliens", King Julien teams with Clover, Maurice and Hector to investigate why he's not the one being abducted.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep34
programme.desc: The Butterfly War - King Julien declares a war against butterflies to raise his kingdom's spirit, but when the village is destroyed he decides to hold a peace summit.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep33
programme.desc: Blank Day / Haircuffed - When Poppy finds out theres a day on the Troll calendar with no existing holiday, as Queen she must help choose a new one./In an attempt to get Creek and Branch to stop arguing, Poppy braids their hair together, forcing them to learn to get along.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep34
programme.desc: Marshtato Fairy / Do the Biggie - On the foggiest night of the year, the Marshtato Fairy magically delivers marshtatos to Troll Village, which every Troll loves and celebrates- except for Branch, who doesnt think the Marshtato Fairy exists. When Poppy encourages him to believe, Branch set out to prove Poppy wrong. /When Biggie accidentally invents a dance craze, he realizes how much he enjoys being the center of attention. Biggie and Guy set out to create another Troll dance sensation in order to keep Biggies big moment going.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep7
programme.desc: A Tale Of Two Turbos / The Escargot Affair - Turbo is surprised to learn that somebody in town is pretending to be him and must find the imposter before they can cause more trouble. // Turbo is invited to a fancy dinner party in his honor but learns that he is actually on the menu, so it's up to the crew to save him.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep8
programme.desc: Surf N Turf / Hardcase Returns - The snails' relaxing day at the beach is threatened when the sewer surfing roaches challenge them to a surfing contest. // Hardcase returns and threatens to take revenge on, so the crew becomes his bodyguards and takes the job a little too seriously.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep27
programme.desc: Big in Japan - Wally and Wenda travel to Tokyo for a Manga festival and meet up with Koichi, fellow Wanderer and Go Hero Go fan. But when Fritz is accidentally zapped by the Mega Mega Monster key, he grows to the size of Godzilla and tries to eat all the noodles in the city. The wanderers must stop him and get the key back.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep50
programme.desc: Lucky and the Endless Possibilities - While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep51
programme.desc: Can't Hardly Bait / Crood Detente - After Womp is told he can't attend the upcoming school ceremony, Thunk makes it his personal mission to get Womp to pass every subject before the ceremony; When the Valleyites disagree with letting the Broods move to Ahhh! Valley, Grug throws a giant party to force them to become best friends

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep50
programme.desc: Blindsided - A huge storm hits Dragon's Edge causing the Dragons to spook and run off but when Astrid is blinded, Hiccup must lead her to Stormfly.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep2
programme.desc: Cat's in the Cradle - When an unexpected kitten shows up on Boss Babys doorstep, they go head to head against the feline enemy

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep5
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Terrifying Perilous Misfortune of the T.P. Mummy - After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep13
programme.desc: End of the Dragon Master - Po, the kids, and the new Panda Guardians must work together to defeat Jindiao once and for all, and get a visit from an unlikely source

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep50
programme.desc: CJ Wooferbug/What Did I Miss - DJ is excited to give her niece CJ her own wooferbug for her birthday. But the wooferbug proves difficult to transport across Trolls Village. Will DJ be able to get it to CJ before CJs birthday party ends?/When Peppy takes an entire day to get a new haircut, he asks Poppy to fill him in on what he missed. What follows is a series of short sketches, as we explore an average day in Troll Village.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep50
programme.desc: Koto, Plain And Tall - Julien is lost in the jungle and accidentally saves a Mountain Lemur named Koto who turns out to be the biggest threat the kingdom has ever faced

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep50
programme.desc: Little Lamb - When Puss and Dulcinea tracked down the Grotto of Riches, they each have their own plan on how to convince Mary and her flock to help find the Obelisk

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep10
programme.desc: Yukon Do It! - Arf gets a chance to run with real sled dogs when he travels with Wally and Wenda to wintry northern Canada to deliver an important package to Wizard Whitebeard, who is off watching the Northern Lights with a fellow wizard.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep6
programme.desc: Lula's Last Stand / Triple Trouble - Little Lula has set up a lemonade stand, but shes not getting any business. The Zenkos swing into action to send customers her way. / When Donna, Fawna and Rona have a spat, the triplets longstanding annual tradition of viewing a comet together is in jeopardy. Now its up to Team Zenko to get the three feuding sisters back together again before the comet streaks by.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep24
programme.desc: Bigpaw, Big Problems / Captain Scooch and Scally-Tag - Tag, Scooch and Kit think they found the perfect story for their newspaper: Bigpaw is in Pawston! But when they find out that Frank and Beans were lying to the town, they seek to uncover the truth and reveal it to everyone. \ When Sam Whippet sets up a pirate-themed race for the Race Cadets, pirate-loving Scooch takes on the role of captain. Tag struggles to take orders as first mate while helping Scooch navigate maritime obstacles and avoid the fearsome pirates.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep47
programme.desc: The Case Of The Disappearing Special Things - When Fuse's collection of Special Things goes missing, Noddy vows to track them down. He soon works out that Bling was in Fuse's Workshop but it turns out that she just went in to add a Special Thing to Fuse's collection. More clues lead Noddy to Smartysaurus. She admits she went into Fuse's Workshop but tripped on an oil can and fled when she saw all the mess she'd made. As for the Special Things, they'd already gone when she got there. Noddy begins to despair but then he works out that the oil can must have been left by whoever took the Special Things. Remembering that Pat-Pat's scooter was squeaky, Noddy goes to the Treehouse and finds the Pockets with Fuse's Special Things. They'd 'found' Fuse's Special Things and taken them to start a collection of their own. They apologies for taking the special things and, as a reward for owning up, Fuse gives them a tool from his workshop to start their own collection. Well done Noddy. Case closed!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep47
programme.desc: Why Skunk Smells - You see there was a time when Skunk didn't smell. Skunk smelt as sweet as sweet can be. Infact, whenever any animal had a smelly problem they went straight to Skunk. And then one day naughty Baboon tricks Skunk into tasting the yucky Smellyfruit! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep47
programme.desc: Big Chris Gets Lucky - Big Chris realises that he only ever has good luck when he has his lucky mascot with him. But what happens when he loses it on race day?

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep21
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Space Suit - It's a snowy day in Greendale, and Ted Glen has invited the kids to his workshop to meet his friend, space expert Professor Farrow. Julian's excited but so is Pat, who has always yearned to be an astronaut. He's even more thrilled when he finds that his special delivery is a space suit - an extra surprise for the kids. When his van breaks down in a snowy lane, he finds an ingenious solution - only to suffer a puncture - and Ted is unable to help... Meanwhile, Professor Farrow and Lauren take the kids out into the snow and re-create the surface of the moon. Pat's determined to make his delivery, but how will he make it on foot through the snow? As the kids perfect their snowy moon, a space-suited figure approaches - Pat in the space suit. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep48
programme.desc: The Case Of The Grey Coins - The Captain is upset because all of his shiny gold coins have been painted grey. It's a disaster as far as the pirates are concerned! Noddy decides to investigate. He realises that the grey coins are actually the gold coin covered with paint. They're not the only things that have turned grey too Deltoid's shiny gold medal has been painted grey too. After following all the clues, Noddy works out that the Naughticorns are the culprits! They were jealous of anything being shinier or more golden than their shiny gold horns! The Naughticorns apologise to the other toys and soon everyone has their shiny gold coins and medals back to normal again. Phew! Thank you, Noddy! Case Closed.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep48
programme.desc: Why Cricket Crickets / Chirrups - You see there was a time when Cricket didn't chirrup. Infact Cricket didn't do anything at all and it was beginning to get him down. Every animal has a use. Elephant trumpets, Lion roars...but what does Cricket do? And then one day Cricket discovers that he has rhythm. Cricket finds the beat! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep48
programme.desc: Silver Hatch Fun Run - Roary and Plugger really want Big Chris to take part in the fun run but Big Chris isn't so sure. Can they make sure he trains for it without even realising?

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep22
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Stormy Birthday - It's Chris Beacon's birthday and he's looking forward to spending the day onshore and having a party at the village hall. Pat's SDS mission is to pick up all the presents from everyone who won't be able to be at the party later. The kids and Lauren are working on decorating the village hall and making Ben a big card from them all whilst Nisha and Ajay provide special birthday cakes for Chris and Micawber and Alf and Dorothy send over lovely fresh eggs and cheese and a special homemade woolly jumper. Meanwhile, the weather is getting worse out at Pencaster Lighthouse and Chris realises, sadly, that he'll have to stay and man the lighthouse and make sure that the passing boats are protected. He won't be able to join everyone for his birthday after all! But Pat has a great idea if Chris can't come to the birthday party, the birthday party can come to him! With the help of the SDS helicopter Pat delivers all of Chris's birthday presents directly to him at the lighthouse! Everyone contacts Chris by video conference so that even if they can't be there, he's not alone on his birthday! Special delivery service mission accomplished!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep16
programme.desc: Divewings - When sea-dwelling dragons called Divewings start attacking ships near the island, the Rescue Riders have to find out what's making them so upset.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep16
programme.desc: Battering Ram - When parts go missing from the garage, Ace and Skya solve the mystery when they discover D-Structs has a new claw-tail which they put to the test.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep16

programme.desc: The Fish Pond - Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a fish pond he used to visit when he was a little piggy. He is a little surprised to learn that a few things have changed since then.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep625
programme.desc: The Olden Days - Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. Peppa and Suzy don't remember being that young but are pleased to see that they've always been best friends.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep155
programme.desc: Ron's Sunburn - Ron has gotten a terrible sunburn and is too embarrassed to come outside and play with his friends. They try everything they can think of to get him to play with them. They even try tempting him with Froga's freshly baked cookies!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep156
programme.desc: Bubu's Portrait - Anna is painting a beautiful portrait of Bubu as a surprise gift. As she is missing a colour, she leaves the painting in the meadow for a moment. Meanwhile, Christopher arrives and finds the abandoned painting, he decides to take it to Bubu's.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Blue's Storytime with Camila - We dive deeper into American Sign Language and the Deaf community. Camila the librarian wants to tell a story with us using ASL, but what story? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!
